spans.text: Taki walked to the center of the slope's end, where a convenience store she often frequented was located. The bluish neon sign emitted a familiar, home-like glow, which seemed particularly welcoming in the dim, deserted twilight.
(Speaking of which, the beer I bought before is long gone, and I'm almost out of nutritional jelly, should I take this opportunity to replenish my stock?)
(Things haven't been going well, I should buy some alcohol to relieve the fatigue.)
(No, never mind... I'm really not in the mood for shopping today.)
